record.description: University of Chicago Championship 1896 Baseball Team: third row, right to left: H. M. Adkinson, A. A. Stagg (coach), and F. D. Nichols; second row: H. T. Clarke, H. D. Abells, and Scott Brown (captain); first row: H. E. Jones, M. G. Clarke, C. S. Winston, C. B. Herschberger, and O. J. Sweet. Picture in lower left corner of Charles S. Pike, catcher and right fielder was sick when photograph was taken.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Name of man in the corner is not legible on the reverse side. Mounted on board.
